summary: This bill, the Dads Matter Act of 2025, aims to increase awareness of the importance of father inclusion and engagement during pregnancy, childbirth, and postpartum. It mandates the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a public awareness campaign and provide guidance to states on encouraging father involvement. The bill highlights the benefits of father participation for both maternal and infant health outcomes and mandates a Government Accountability Office (GAO) study on the Act's effectiveness.
